reviews.review: good singleplayer campaign and fun multiplayer
fun
The first Portal was amazing - this is even better!

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
- Amazing, fun and diverse puzzles in which you figure out the mechanics and how to use them through the story or by aspects of the game, just a short tutorial needed.
- Simple controls that feel natural and respond well.
- Constantly changing and different environments, making you want to explore more, which is then rewarded with story progression and a better knowledge of mechanics for later use.
- Each chapter feels just the right length so it never feels like you're just doing the same thing.
- An easy-to-use map creator and workshop compatibility so you can create and play.
- A co-op mode that uses many elements of the single-player mode, while also introducing new ones that wouldn't be possible without two players.

[h1]Graphics and sound[/h1]
- Holds up well in terms of graphics, feeling detailed but staying simple.
- Runs well and looks good even on less powerful computers.
- Good soundtrack, but stays subtle and quiet to match the game's atmosphere.

[h1]Story[/h1]
- Fun and developed characters, such as [spoiler]Wheatley and GLaDOS[/spoiler].
- Carries on and builds on the story of the first Portal very well, answering many questions while building on the universe.
- Funny [spoiler](especially with many of Wheatley's lines)[/spoiler] and emotional [spoiler](With GLaDOS waking up, learning about Cave Johnson and Caroline and the ending when GLaDOS lets you go and the turret opera plays)[/spoiler].
- [spoiler]Good character arcs and redemption for both GLaDOS when she's PotatOS and Wheatley when we see him in space at the end of the game.[/spoiler]
It's an amazing game even 7/8/9 years on from it's original release

Half-Life'ın kardeşi Portal serisinin ikinci oyunu... Benim oynadığım tüm bulmaca oyunları arasında en iyi hikayeye sahip, en iyi olay örgüsüne sahip, en iyi karakterlerine ve en iyi fiziğine sahip oyundur. Evet, bu oyunda fiziğe dayandırılan bulmacalar ile hikayeye devam ediyor. Kısacası bulmaca oyunlarını oynarım diyorsanız, alın oynayın.

Not: Bu oyun indirimlerde sakız fiyatına iniyor. İndirimleri beklemenizde yarar var.
2 kişi oynandığı zaman aklınızın sınırlarını zorlayacak bir oyun eski olmasına rağmen hala oynatıyor kendisini.

너무재미있어요

ЧТО ЭТО ТАКОЕ?
- Это игра, в жанре головоломка где нужно думать с порталами и окружением. Помогает потрепать голову.
ОПРАВДАННА ЛИ ЦЕНА?
- Абсолютно. Хороший перевод, качественно подобранный саундтрек и даже возможность создать свои головоломки.
КАКОЙ ФУНКЦИОНАЛ?
- 1. Одиночная игра, с историей и прочей бурдой. Рекомендуется проходить самой первой перед всем остальным контентом (но сначала пройдите первую часть)
  2. Игра по сети. Тут уже нужно думать с 4 порталами, и нужен друг (или просто рандомный чел который будет в сети). Отличный режим, рекомендуется пройти после одиночной игры.
  3. Камеры (карты) от сообщества. Если уже прошли всё что можно и нельзя, это ваш вариант. Скачивайте какой нибудь BEE2 и мастерите свои карты, или просто скачивайте карты от других игроков.
ЕСТЬ ЛИ ДОПОЛНЕНИЯ?
- Да, и очень много. Уже доступные дополнения: Portal Stories: Mel, Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative и Portal Reloaded (та самая Portal 3, которую вы желали).
ГДЕ СКАЧАТЬ САУНДТРЕК?
- В стиме он доступен, и даже бесплатен. (Название - Portal 2 Soundtrack)
НУ И ЧТО В ИТОГЕ?
- Отличная игра, хорошо подобранный саундрек и хорошие головоломки. Рекомендуется к покупке вместе с первой частью.

This game is so much fun. A great campaign which I never get tired of replaying. Hilarious writing and characters, especially considering you don't really actually interact with any of them--unless you count shuffling potatoes around the Aperture Science building.

yeah

Perhaps the greatest 3d puzzle game ever made. Fantastic on every front, even years later.

Levels are well designed, and properly play with assumptions to create clever and unusual solutions to problems.

Sound design is spot on, and dialog is both enjoyable and well written. Characters are interesting, and this leads to engaging interactions with the player.

All in all, 10/10.
